duplicate_installation: The ClothCalc UserScript has been installed twice, with two different languages. You should disable one of the two languages for the UserScript to work properly.
api_registration_failed: Registration of the TW-DB.info UserScript with TheWestApi failed.
script_description: The ClothCalc UserScript is a project created by the TW-DB.info team. It offers many features and extensions that will give you an improved gaming experience - saving your time and optimizing some of your activities.
paypal_alt: PayPal - The safest and easiest way to pay online!
cache_reset_complete: Reset completed, the page will reload
export_copy_failed: Automatic copy failed or is not supported. Please manually copy the Settings from the box below.
import_paste_instructions: Please paste your Settings in the box below and press Import.
export_clipboard_success: Settings were automatically copied to clipboard.
import_warning: Warning: Importing settings will replace current settings. Have you read the warning?
import_no_data: No settings were entered in the box. Import cancelled.
import_json_preview: The following JSON will be imported:
import_error: Error importing settings. Check if the text is valid JSON.
import_clipboard_success: Settings were read from clipboard. Proceeding with import...
import_clipboard_error: Error in try/catch for clipboard read, enabling manual import:
cancel_quest_message: Are you sure you want to cancel this quest?

church_levels: Show additional church levels you can build
improved_ch_tab: Show only buildings that are not fully constructed
profile_duel_exp: Show duel experience in player profiles

settings_collector_text: Mark items in Trader and Market that you don't have in your inventory yet
settings_collector_sell_text: Add a button to sell all except one selected item in the Trader
settings_pin_items_text: Pin items in the Inventory window
settings_instant_quest_text: Complete a quest directly if all requirements are met
settings_colored_quest_text: Change the color of quests that can be completed

settings_task_list_points_text: Add Labor Points indicator and health points tips to Task List - [Bottom right]

settings_enhanced_fort_recruitment_text: Enhance Recruitment tab before fort battle
settings_declare_report_text: Link battle axe unearthing report to the specific attack fort
settings_cemetery_critical_text: Critical hits and Ghost Rounds in fort cemetery
settings_total_dmg_battle_text: Total damage dealt in each player's description during fort battle
settings_battle_info_round_text: Accurate hits, missed shots, hits taken and shot dodges per round
settings_building_progress_text: Show construction progress in a building window
settings_church_levels_text: Show additional church levels you can build
settings_improved_ch_tab_text: Show only buildings that are not fully constructed
settings_town_forum_blink_text: Remove Town button blinking if there is a new message in Town Forum
settings_market_reminder_text: Add a reminder for Market auctions

settings_market_report_text: Enhance the Report icon for sale in Market
settings_improved_market_text: Enhance the buy window in Market
settings_duel_motivation_text: Add a permanent indicator for Duel Motivation - [Below Energy indicator]
settings_direct_sleep_text: Add a button for direct transition to Hotel or Barracks
settings_deposit_text: Add a button for Money Deposit at the Bank you are at
settings_exp_bar_text: Add values to Experience Bar - Credits and thanks to (Leones/Slygoxx/Belle Bernice)
settings_mini_chat_gui_text: Add a button to minimize Chat Rooms
settings_custom_event_counter_text: Move event counter on large screens (Event Coin, Hiro&#39;s script)
settings_no_scrollbars_text: Disable scrollbars on small screens or when moving windows too far
settings_close_all_wear_text: Add a button to automatically close only Inventory windows
settings_profile_duel_exp_text: Show duel experience in player profiles
settings_regen_timers_text: Add regeneration timers to player portrait
settings_button_church_text: Add a button for easier opening of Church building window
settings_button_market_text: Add a button for easier opening of Market window
settings_show_bonus_jobs_text: Add option to show bonus jobs
settings_show_coordinates_text: Add option to move to specified coordinates
settings_no_work_queue_pa_text: Disable notifications for Premium Automation purchase

settings_chest_analyser_text: Add Chest Analyser to Telegram/Reports window

settings_telegram_bb_codes_text: Add a button to change to unformatted text in telegrams
settings_enhanced_rankings_text: Enhance Ranking tabs and add player difference
settings_pin_important_el_text: Keep Menu, Experience and script line always at the top
settings_night_mode_text: Dark Theme mode for The-West map
settings_improved_whisper_text: Enhance Whisper sound in various Saloon chats (While the setting is enabled, you can listen and change the sound directly from the list below)

analyser_reset_confirm_message: Give the report link of the first report that should be read after the reset
